alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 09 at 9:56AM EST until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Deland affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .The forecast point at Deland is currently rising through Minor Flood Stage and is forecast to reach Moderate Flood Stage by tomorrow as impacts from Tropical Storm Nicole arrive to the basin. Residents should prepare for moderate flood impacts to return before the weekend. For the St. Johns River...including Deland...Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Deland. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.8 feet, Water starts to enter low lying buildings around Hontoon Island. Many secondary roads and homes in low lying areas are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM EST Wednesday was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 4.8 feet tomorrow morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon St Johns River Deland 4.0 4.7 Wed 8 am 4.8 4.8 4.8 4.8 4.8 &&
